title: Su-asa
author: Su-asa
content: Good day my fellow Nigerians, I come with one matter way they common for this our country in some locality, I suppose drop this discussion for the gambling board but I just say make I drop am for this our board because e they too common these days and our people say,  person way they sick na know were they pain am.Before I start to talk, I go like ask one question, the question be say how many Nigerian youths, couples or families way you know say gambling done affect or favour?You fit done see this post for the gambling section but this discussion na for only us, na make I carry am come here, these days the rate of gambling for this our country done increase and the thing they really affect us, although say na the way our economy take they very bad na make plenty people just go into gambling and them think say all of a sudden them go make quick money from there but e no letter work out good for most of them and some done even turn addicted gamblers.Wating I they try to talk be say this gambling of a thing no they help our economy at all, so wating you get to talk for this matter.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Similar discussion: Why dem dey invest and Dem no dey get moneyQuote from: Su-asa on September 21, 2023, 08:50:24 PMWating I they try to talk be say this gambling of a thing no they help our economy at all, so wating you get to talk for this matter. Gambling may not help addicts but it is helping the economy. Many people are employed directly or indirectly because of the gambling businesses in Nigeria. Government are taxing gambling sites and they are generating part of internal revenue from gambling.For my other comment, read my post in the link I provided so I will not be repeating what I have posted before.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: I hat else do you expect in a country where nothing serious is working, and the cost of leaving is trying to kill the leaving? Most people wey de gamble now no get option than to gamble, because them want make their small money turn big money so that they can use it for their basic needs.Almost everyone gambling know that they can lose money and this act can be addicted to them which may be very hard to control anymore, but they will keep trying with the hope of winning so that they can take care of their  people and other needs.

comments.author: Su-asa
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on September 21, 2023, 09:03:09 PMSimilar discussion: Why dem dey invest and Dem no dey get moneyQuote from: Su-asa on September 21, 2023, 08:50:24 PMWating I they try to talk be say this gambling of a thing no they help our economy at all, so wating you get to talk for this matter. Gambling may not help addicts but it is helping the economy. Many people are employed directly or indirectly because of the gambling businesses in Nigeria. Government are taxing gambling sites and they are generating part of internal revenue from gambling.For my other comment, read my post in the link I provided so I will not be repeating what I have posted before.Well, if you said so, I don't see how gambling is helping the Nigerian economy, because even the gambling industry does not employ good numbers of citizens. People who are not benefiting from gambling are much more than people who are benefiting from it. Although they are paying revenue to the government, but the government fails to understand that the numbers of citizens that are addicted to gambling is much bigger than those that are employed in the business.In some countries, if they see that more people are not benefiting from gambling or anything, they will ban that thing.  Countries like Qatar, Cambodia and many more.Those countries that do not allow gambling, their economy are much appreciated than ours, instead of the government to ban gambling and make Bitcoin legal, they turn it the other way.

comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on September 21, 2023, 08:50:24 PM, the question be say how many Nigerian youths, couples or families way you know say gambling done affect or favour? Yes I don see person way gambling Favour; eh get one guy like that way dy call him self  mayor of Ekiti  the guy don chop Watin no nice from gambling and him don use am become person for life as him they get better endorsement deals 4rm some gambling site them way him they use as per the influence way him get and him they also share link of games them way they sometime enter for people and others way they also follow cut. But because eh work for one person no mean say eh go work for you too, so person just need they on guide, if eh no Favour you no too push am fine work do then make better earning way u fit use sustain ur self and ur family that is if u get any family, gambling the way some people they use carry am for head like say nah where them go only fit use make am for this life they tire me, until them realize say gambling no be hustle most people go ruin their life and dem go remain poor unless say luck come dre side one day then them hit am big if not nah heart break upon heart break, eh cut 2 today eh cut 1 tomorrow those kind things dem way go they make dem to try harder next time.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: The tin dey pain us too as citizens if we see our brodas wey don dey addicted to dis tin and dem no fit leave am. Many of dem join bcos say dem no get hope for d government again and dem fill like luck go just come from heaven come make dem win big for here, but d reality be say, nothing profitable like dat comes easy. Dey keep trying hoping dat one day they’ll get d rewards, but small win after many big losses go make dem wan continue and na so so d addiction don start be dat. Sometimes I go dey feel say na jazz dos gambling sites dey use sometime…lol, wen u tink say you wan win, you go just lose again. The tin be say make dem just control their gambling ways becos d repercussions dey always dey bad in d end.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on September 21, 2023, 08:50:24 PMWating I they try to talk be say this gambling of a thing no they help our economy at all, so wating you get to talk for this matter. Na here way you carry end am na em be like say you no talk am well.Gambling na very lucrative and active industry for we nation and across the world. Na why, you Dey see the growth way Dey surface for the industry with new brands and outlets everywhere.You also need realize say, these na taxed industry and e dey remit for treasury which means, e dey help the economy more than you know. Yes o, e hard to win bet but, some people Dey win am. I got attest for one person way gambling bring am close to a stable life style via say, e luckily hit a sizeable win con commot body for gambling. The rest na just your win decision on how to ensure say, your water no run dry.No expect say gambling go end anytime soon o, e legal and government dey from there see money. Na in exchange na em economy dey boom and e dey happen for gambling.

Gambling fit favour you today and still affect you tomorrow. I don see person wey win six million naira for gambling and still use that same six million naira gamble again, to cut the story short the guy become homeless. When you're into gambling no they expect sey e go they favour u always or e go they affect you all the time. Everybody no sey gambling na 50/50 chance, but plenty people they over look the risk wey dey involved to the extent wey them they even carry am as their only source of income which is not suppose to be so. Gambling no dey reliable so I no advice anybodu to relie on am as only place wey u fit make money the best thing na to use am as side hustle

comments.body: Quote from: Asiska02 on September 21, 2023, 11:22:07 PMMany of dem join bcos say dem no get hope for d government again govt is not responsible for ur gambling habit, u should know u are responsible for ur action .many Nigerians blame govt for everything, I have seen someone who is a staff in an oil company but he is addicted to gambling, how about those that are into prostitutions, armed rubbers, drunkard etc is it the fault of the govt that they are living that kind of live.Even the children of politicians are into gambling , in this case who are u to blame.u are who u choose to be regardless of the circumstances. opportunity dose nt make a man it reveals him to himselfU

comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: Any gambler gambling strictly and desperately to make profits in the gamble is really out of the minds because gambling platforms are not charity programs to enrich whoever that signs in to the platforms. Periodically the gambling board is projected to generate finances for the site owners and in most cases, it is programed in a vice versa. Systematically is to also have the gamblers little chances to win so they could always retain their interests of staying further on the gambling sites that's why the gamblers could even have those little privileges of winning unless it's one of those live games which can't be manipulated by the game bookmakers.It's certainly not worth celebrating to say gamblers are lot winning in the casino when you don't know you number of people that has lost in the gamble. Gambling site's benefits more than the gamblers and failure for gamblers to debunk those buzzes picturing gambling to be easy routes of making money would always end them up loosing the little funds they've realized during this had times.The strategy doesn't work at all Op. Winning up to #50,000 today and in all of your lost being accumulated you realizes that you've lost more than the #50,000 you just won at at time, who's fooling who? Because some persons would still think they've won some profits but right in, they're still loosing because they're only on the recovery of their losts.Gambling is not a source of income although you can be lucky to win on your first stake and then you can just run away and never bet again. Haha.But with that taste of winning in the first place it'd be hard to stay off after making your first winning.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Many governors try to put an end to this gambling in their various state to stop the youths from gambling, but their plan failed at the end because the youths begin to see governors as their enemy blocking their destiny. Do you know how many people that went to prison because of gambling, and till now they are still gambling to recover the money they have loss in gambling, which they will never recover from it until they leave gambling. There are some people that will never believe that gambling can make them not to progress in life like the way some people who don't gamble to make their capital from gambling are progressing, and it will be very hard for such people to have bad name in gambling.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Dis matter you no go only look am from the gambling perspective, but different angles but the root cause of the increase in numbers of gamblers dey link to the situation of the contri. Low job opportunities, nepotism, hardship etc, so based on say how di contri don cast, people dey see gambling as a way out of their predicament. Say if dem fit win big money, dem fit use am set up a business and live their lives well. But e no dey always go dat way as dem dey end up being wrecked by gambling.

Low job opportunities, nepotism, hardship etc, so based on say how di contri don cast, people dey see gambling as a way out of their predicament. Say if dem fit win big money, dem fit use am set up a business and live their lives well. But e no dey always go dat way as dem dey end up being wrecked by gambling. Not just in Nigeria only. Generally gambling can be a gate out of poverty and also it can be a gate into poverty. What someone might take serious and to be successful someone else would do same thing abd suck at it. There are people who went into gambling because of their freind, colleague or family member became successful through gambling. They do not understand the level of discipline and tolerance that person has gobe through before being successful.I know life is full of risk but if we should take risk it should be something what risking for. Am supporting the opinion that gambling shouldn't be considered as a career or wirk. There is nothing like a professional gambler.
